message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You could have had 50, now I'm taking 60. Don't be greedy!
You're getting aggressive, I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're not being generous, I'm taking what I want. Don't expect any mercy!
You're getting desperate, I'm giving you a huge chunk, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of again!
